de.mrapp.android.bottomsheet.adapter

Class DividableGridAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • de.mrapp.android.bottomsheet.adapter.DividableGridAdapter

  • public class DividableGridAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    An adapter, which manages the items of a BottomSheet. It allows to show the items in a list or grid and supports to show dividers.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DividableGridAdapter(Context context, BottomSheet.Style style, int width)
      Creates a new adapter, which manages the items of a BottomSheet.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DividableGridAdapter

        public DividableGridAdapter(@NonNull
                            Context context,
                            BottomSheet.Style style,
                            int width)
        Creates a new adapter, which manages the items of a BottomSheet.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the adapter, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        style - The style, which should be used to display the adapter's items, as a value of the enum BottomSheet.Style. The style may either be LIST, LIST_COLUMNS or GRID
        width - The width of the bottom sheet, the items, which are displayed by the adapter, belong to, as an Integer value
